TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CreateCustomWidgetArgs extends GLib.SignalArgs

remarks.para: The event invokes delegates which pass event data via this class.
If you set the to a in an event handler, the specified widget will be added to a custom tab in the print dialog.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Create a new instance with this constructor if you need to invoke a delegate.
